comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC image of Manuel A. Esteva, evidently taken at the same time:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5455606027/in/photostream/]

Perhaps also a participant in the 1914 Peace Conference at Niagara Falls, Canada?

comment._content: Thanks Wystan for making the connection between these 2 photographs.  We will update the description.
